abstract: Every year when the wattles bloom I remember when I first arrived.
description: Si Tuan Lieng and his wife are retirees and have recently made an overseas trip to China. In this story he talks about his life and family, their integration into Australian society since they left Vietnam over 26 years ago and highlights of their holiday in China.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001300; Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men); Active; 2007
